H0.text: Who together with Vince Clarke, formed the pop duo 'Yazoo'. David Bowie

H1.text: Who together with Vince Clarke, formed the pop duo 'Yazoo'. George Michael

H2.text: Who together with Vince Clarke, formed the pop duo 'Yazoo'. Simon Le Bon

H3.text: Who together with Vince Clarke, formed the pop duo 'Yazoo'. Alf Moyet

A4.text: At the age of 20, Moyet's mainstream pop career began in 1982 with the formation of the synth-pop duo Yazoo with former Depeche Mode member Vince Clarke.

A5.text: she came to prominence as a member of the synth-pop duo Yazoo (known as Yaz in North America)
